# [Interview #195: ComicCon Reports, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=195#11)

#### Question

*Crossroads of Twilight*
was kinda slow. Was that the calm before the storm?

#### Robert Jordan

Emphatic yes. "You'll be sweatin' before you finish
*Knife of Dreams*
."
